actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Motion to discharge Committee on Energy and Natural Resources rejected in Senate, roll call #7 (34-53).

official_title: A resolution to disapprove energy action numbered 3, an executive branch proposal to exempt aviation gasoline and kerosene-base jet fuel from mandatory petroleum allocation regulations.

summary.text: Disapproves energy action 3, an executive branch proposal to exempt aviation gasoline and kerosene-base jet fuel from mandatory petroleum allocation regulations.

titles.title: A resolution to disapprove energy action numbered 3, an executive branch proposal to exempt aviation gasoline and kerosene-base jet fuel from mandatory petroleum allocation regulations.
